16 Brooks Calvo

Position RHP

Hometown St. Augustine, Fla.

Bio

Related

Stats

Biography

2018: Saw time in 14 games, earning six starts … Picked up a pair of victories and three saves … Tossed 26.2 frames … Struck out 22 batters while walking just 12 … Worked two frames, striking out one, and picked up the win in the win over Emmanuel … Earned the win after working four innings, striking out three, against Chowan … Tossed two innings, striking out one, to pick up the save over Columbus State … Struck out two batters in 3.1 innings of work against Wingate … Struck out the side against Newberry … Picked up a three-inning save in the win over Lander … Recorded an out against Flagler … Went 1.1 frames, striking out one, in the win over Emmanuel.

2017: Redshirted.

2016: Saw time in 12 contests, going 1-1 on the year … Posted 30 strikeouts in 38 innings … Worked four innings, giving up one unearned run and struck out three in the win over Lincoln Memorial … Tossed 4.1 innings, striking out four in the series-opening win over Armstrong State … Struck out six in 3.2 innings of work in the series-opening win over Lander … Worked seven innings, striking out seven in the series opener against Georgia College … Struck out one in the win over Emmanuel … Worked 3.1 innings, striking out two, en route to picking up the win over North Georgia … Threw two innings, striking out two, in the win over Montevallo … Tossed 4.1 innings of scoreless work in the win at Newberry.

Previous School: Attended South Georgia State College.

High School: Attended Nease H.S.

Personal: Brooks Christopher Calvo was born Nov. 27, 1994 in Jacksonville, Fla. ... Son of Randy and Jeanine Calvo ... Has two siblings, Bryant and Blair ... Majoring in sociology.
